EmailTemplate.name: 17.IPRout.Partner.All.A.G.E.18203.Pricing Catalog Update for Nuage for partners.
EmailTemplate.subject: e-Bulletin: Nuage Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> e-Bulletin: Nuage Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs update Dear Nokia Partners,
Updated Nuage Partner Product and Maintenance Services Price Catalogs [including new Nuage Quotation] have been made available on the new Nokia PRM Partner Portal <[[https://nokia.lightning.force.com/lightning/page/home]]> [Path to reach the catalogs: Account ->Details -> Personal space links -> Partner Pricing folders].
- Key Highlights: Generated with new Nuage pricing tool v1.2.8 [PPP v75]. Includes Hardware and Software updates:
- How to use the new Nuage price catalogs and quoting tool sessions will be organized in November 2017, via WebEx sessions. Invites will be sent shortly. - Product Notifications: To receive notifications on product updates, manufacture discontinued dates and other product status changes, please subscribe to Notifications in OLCS (Nokia’s on-line customer support website). To receive notifications on partner price catalog updates, please subscribe to Notifications in Partner Portal/Partner Personal space.
For more information:
Pricing information is available on new Nokia PRM Partner Personal folder. Please contact me should you have any questions.
Bogdan Vasilescu Nokia Global Partner Program and Sales Team Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
